description:
Track and evaluate the performance of your investment portfolio across stocks, cryptocurrencies, and other assets.


- New: Updated to Eclipse 2024-12
- New: Additional derived data series in the assets chart (e.g., invested capital for any classifications, not just the total portfolio).
- New: New column: Indicator for the price range.
- New: Purchase value/price now displayed both with and without taxes/fees in the assets overview.
- New: Reference account balance in the list of securities accounts.
- New: Sorting options for classifications when editing a security.
- New: Ctrl-D to duplicate a transaction in tables.
- New: PDF importer for Ginmon VL Sparen.
- Improvement: Windows version now supports ARM-based devices.
- Improvement: Default currency is suggested based on the locale (for new files).
- Fix: Australian trading calendar now correctly shifts "Australia Day" to the next weekday when it falls on a weekend.
- Fix: Corrected chart legend labels in some languages.
- Fix: Resolved issue with GBX/GBP rates from Yahoo Finance.
- Fix: No more white screen flashes in Dark Theme (macOS tables).
- Improvements to the PDF importers for DKB, Targo Bank, Hypothekarbank, PostFinance, Swissquote, Baader Bank, Commerzbank, Scalable Capital, ING, Sunrise, Consorsbank, and DADAT.
